methods.name: findSimilar
methods.description: Returns a list of similar questions based on the title of the specified question.

methods.name: setBestReply
methods.signature: public static Void setBestReply(String questionId, String replyId)
methods.description: Sets the specified reply for the specified question as the best reply. Because a question can have multiple replies, setting the best reply helps users quickly identify the reply that contains the most helpful information.
